channel.title: Failed to start systemd-repart.service - Repartition Root Disk
channel.description:
Hi
Can anyone help, with why my VM's show this error on boot? Everything works as expected though, except, but might not be related, many reboots hang on the "Invalid DMI field header" and I have to reset/stop-start the VM. ![image|690x438](upload://avwLj7luISzYzWqaK9ep4hO5EK2.png)
Running VirtualBox on Windows 11. Guest OS is newest Kicksecure/whonix
Please let me know what info I can provide. I still new to Linux troubleshooting, so not sure what makes sense to post as info.
[EDIT] I noticed the Swap file notice, and have since given the VM more memory. The info is gone, but the error is still present. [/EDIT]
Regards Lars

item.title: Failed to start systemd-repart.service - Repartition Root Disk
item.dc:creator: nOrphf
item.description:
Hi

Can anyone help, with why my VM’s show this error on boot?
Everything works as expected though, except, but might not be related, many reboots hang on the “Invalid DMI field header” and I have to reset/stop-start the VM.

Running VirtualBox on Windows 11.
Guest OS is newest Kicksecure/whonix

Please let me know what info I can provide. I still new to Linux troubleshooting, so not sure what makes sense to post as info.

[EDIT]
I noticed the Swap file notice, and have since given the VM more memory.
The info is gone, but the error is still present.
[/EDIT]

Regards Lars

Read full topic
item.source: Failed to start systemd-repart.service - Repartition Root Disk
